text: Jean-Jacques Beineix (; 8 October 1946 â€“ 13 January 2022) was a French movie director, producer and screenwriter. He was born in Paris, France. His career began in 1977. His best known movies were Diva, Moon in the Gutter, Betty Blue, Roselyne et les lions and Mortel Transfert. Beineix died on 13 January 2022 at his home in Paris from a long-illness, aged 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Movie producers from Paris Category:French screenwriters Category:Writers from Paris
title: Jean-Jacques Beineix
